title: Orbbec releases two new Gemini stereo cameras for robotics
description:
Orbbec announced new vision products, partnerships, and expanded manufacturing capabilities at CES in Las Vegas.

The post Orbbec releases two new Gemini stereo cameras for robotics appeared first on The Robot Report.
